item.title: 美国法院叫停特朗普关税后，中印等国成为赢家
item.description: 在命运的急转直下中，那些曾因美国总统唐纳德·特朗普的关税政策遭受重创的国家，如今却因最高法院推翻其紧急关税的裁决而成为最大赢家。【原文：In a swift reversal of fortunes, countries that had been hardest hit by US President Donald Trump’s tariffs have emerged as the biggest winners from the Supreme Court’s decision to strike down his emergency levies.】

item.title: 美元下跌，因交易员抛售美国资产以规避贸易政策风险
item.description: 美元兑所有主要货币汇率下跌，因特朗普总统的新关税计划引发了对全球最大经济体前景的担忧。【原文：The dollar dropped against every major currency as President Donald Trump’s fresh tariff plans raised concerns about the outlook for the world’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 印度官员惊慌失措，争分夺秒遏制全球领先的期权热潮
item.description: 2024年秋天，一位印度高级证券监管官员站在满屋子的基金经理和外国投资者面前，传达了一个不同寻常的信息：印度不愿成为全球最大的衍生品市场。【原文：In the autumn of 2024, a senior Indian securities regulator stood before a room full of money managers and foreign investors with an unusual message: India did not want to be the world’s largest derivatives market.】

item.title: 澳大利亚将维持特朗普牛肉关税豁免，行业称
item.description: 作为美国最大的牛肉进口国之一，澳大利亚将继续免于特朗普总统的关税制度。【原文：Australia, one of the biggest foreign suppliers of beef to the US, will keep its exemptions from President Donald Trump’s tariff regime.】

item.title: 纽约市列车与航班受阻，全市严阵以待暴风雪来袭
item.description: 若你计划周一前往纽约市，除非是必要出行，否则最好还是待在家里。【原文：If you’re trying to get into New York City on Monday, unless it’s essential, you’re probably better off hunkering down at home.】

item.title: 英国寻求降低炼油厂碳成本以应对关停潮
item.description: 英国政府正在制定一项战略，以保护其剩余的炼油厂免受碳价上涨的影响，此前已有两家炼油厂关闭。【原文：The UK government is drawing up a strategy to protect its remaining oil refineries from rising carbon prices, after two sites closed.】

item.title: 英国毕业生职位首次跌破1万个，招聘网站Adzuna称
item.description: 英国职位空缺降至五年最低水平，毕业生职位数跌至历史新低，因1月份招聘活动放缓，劳动力市场担忧情绪日益加剧。【原文：UK job vacancies dropped to their lowest in five years and graduate posts fell to a record low as hiring weakened in January amid mounting concerns about the labor market.】

item.title: 韩国总统如何将本国市场打造成全球表现最佳的市场
item.description:
李在明正将自己作为股票交易员时经历的艰辛教训转化为推动集会的力量。【原文：

Lee Jae Myung is using hard lessons from his days as a stock trader to fuel a rally.

】

item.title: 韩国早期出口激增，人工智能热潮推动芯片需求
item.description: 韩国出口在2月初延续了增长势头，这得益于半导体需求的强劲表现，尽管美国关税政策引发的贸易不确定性依然存在。【原文：South Korea’s exports extended their growth momentum in early February, driven by resilient semiconductor demand even as trade uncertainty persists over US tariff policy.】

item.title: 角逐奥斯卡奖的影片数量减少
item.description: 电影界最重要的盛典之夜，正被越来越少的影片所主导。【原文：The industry’s biggest night is dominated by a shrinking set of pictures.】

item.title: 金价上涨，因特朗普关税政策受挫令贸易协议前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 金价上涨，因最高法院限制了特朗普总统的关税权力后，市场对与美国谈判达成的贸易协议前景感到不安。【原文：Gold rose as uncertainty over what would happen to trade deals negotiated with the US, after the Supreme Court restrained President Donald Trump’s tariff powers, unsettled markets.】

item.title: 油价下跌，交易员权衡伊朗核协议前景
item.description: 油价下跌，因投资者权衡美国与伊朗达成核协议的可能性。随着美军在中东集结，本周晚些时候预计将就该问题进行更多谈判。【原文：Oil fell as investors weighed the odds of a nuclear deal between the US and Iran, with more negotiations on the issue expected later this week as American forces mass in the Middle East.】

item.title: 新西兰零售支出超预期，经济持续复苏
item.description: 新西兰第四季度零售额增幅超出经济学家预期，表明2025年最后几个月经济复苏势头持续保持。【原文：New Zealand retail sales increased more than economists expected in the fourth quarter, suggesting the economic recovery maintained its momentum in the final months of 2025.】

item.title: 特朗普将新关税与支付危机挂钩，专家质疑该危机是否存在
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德·特朗普推行新的全球关税政策，他不仅试图修复因最高法院驳回而瓦解的贸易政策，更宣告世界最大经济体正面临严重的国际收支危机。【原文：With his move to impose new global tariffs, US President Donald Trump isn’t just trying to repair a trade policy dismantled by a Supreme Court rebuke. He’s also declaring the world’s largest economy is facing a profound balance-of-payments crisis.】

item.title: 蓝鸮焦虑冲击1.8万亿美元私募信贷市场
item.description:
尽管多年来收益稳定，直接贷款机构仍无法摆脱对这个曾属全球金融小众领域的担忧。

【原文：

Despite years of solid returns, direct lenders can't shake concerns about the once-niche corner of global finance.

】

item.title: 美元汇率在关税不确定性中区间震荡：市场综述
item.description: 周一早盘，美元汇率在窄幅区间内波动，因特朗普总统猛烈抨击美国最高法院推翻其动用紧急权力实施所谓互惠关税的决定后，市场不确定性持续存在。【原文：The US dollar traded in a tight range early Monday as uncertainty lingered after President Donald Trump lashed out at the US Supreme Court for striking down his use of emergency powers to impose so-called reciprocal tariffs.】

item.title: 天空新闻报道称，劳斯莱斯计划斥资15亿英镑回购股票
item.description: 据天空新闻报道，劳斯莱斯控股公司即将宣布一项价值高达15亿英镑（约合20亿美元）的股票回购计划。【原文：Rolls-Royce Holdings PLC is set to announce a share buyback worth as much as £1.5 billion ($2 billion), Sky News reported.】

item.title: 债券市场动能转向空头阵营，抛售信号闪现
item.description: 从最高法院对特朗普关税政策的裁决，到美联储加息的威胁以及劳动力市场韧性的迹象，多重压力正推动31万亿美元规模的国债市场情绪转向，空头再度占据上风。【原文：From the Supreme Court’s decision against Donald Trump’s tariffs to the threat of Federal Reserve rate hikes and signs of labor-market resilience, a range of pressures are forcing a sentiment shift in the $31 trillion Treasury market back in favor of bears.】

item.title: 拉加德称美国关税举措恐破坏与欧盟的平衡关系
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德周日表示，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普最新采取的关税措施可能破坏欧盟与美国之间此前达成的"平衡"，并可能给经济带来新的逆风。【原文：President Donald Trump’s latest tariff moves risk upsetting the previously negotiated “equilibrium” between the European Union and the US and could pose a new headwind to the economy, European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said on Sunday.】

item.title: 期权高手交易指数与指数对赌，引发大规模股票轮动
item.description: 权益期权投资者正将目光投向跨市场相对价值交易，因分散策略的获利机会日益稀缺。【原文：Equity-options investors are looking to relative value trades between markets as opportunities to profit from dispersion strategies become scare.】

item.title: 格雷尔称，尽管关税裁决已出，美国双边贸易协定依然有效
item.description: 美国贸易代表杰米森·格里尔表示，特朗普总统的关税政策在美国最高法院遭遇挫败，但这不会影响政府与贸易伙伴已达成的具体协议。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff-policy defeat in the US Supreme Court won’t unravel individual deals the administration has sealed with its trading partners, US Trade Representative Jamieson Greer said.】

item.title: 英伟达股价如此低迷，即便业绩大爆也可能无济于事
item.description: 多年来，英伟达公司一直是推动股市屡创新高的关键力量。但随着市场对人工智能的质疑日益加剧，华尔街越来越担心，无论本周这家芯片巨头的财报结果如何，都将拖累其股价。【原文：For years, Nvidia Corp. has played a key role in powering the stock market to record highs. But as skepticism about artificial intelligence mounts, Wall Street is increasingly concerned that the chip giant’s earnings report this week will weigh down the shares no matter what the results say.】

item.title: 纽约市及东北部或遭"毁灭性"暴风雪袭击
item.description: 纽约市及东北部地区逾3500万人面临暴风雪预警，一场大规模冬季风暴正威胁着该地区，预计将带来数英尺深的积雪和足以折断树枝、摧毁电线的狂风。【原文：More than 35 million people across New York City and the Northeast are under blizzard warnings as a huge winter storm threatens snow by the foot and howling winds capable of tearing down branches and power lines.】

item.title: 全球资金正推动拉美股市迎来历史性开局
item.description: 全球投资者正以十年来的最快速度涌入拉丁美洲股市，推动该地区各市场攀升至多年高点。【原文：Global investors are piling into Latin American stocks at the fastest clip in a decade, sending markets across the region to multi-year highs.】

item.title: 苹果的下一个重大突破是进军视觉人工智能领域
item.description: 苹果首席执行官蒂姆·库克暗示，视觉智能将成为该公司进军可穿戴人工智能设备领域的核心功能。此外：3月2日当周苹果年度首场新品发布会看点；iPhone 18 Pro配色方案；iOS 26.4最新动态。【原文：Apple CEO Tim Cook is signaling that Visual Intelligence will be the defining feature of the company’s push into wearable AI devices. Also: What to expect from Apple’s first product launches of the year during the week of March 2; the iPhone 18 Pro’s color options; and the latest on iOS 26.4.】

item.title: 匈牙利因"友谊"管道僵局将阻挠欧盟制裁方案
item.description: 匈牙利外交部长彼得·西雅尔托周日表示，该国计划阻止欧盟对俄罗斯实施第20轮制裁，同时"友谊"输油管道的石油运输仍处于停滞状态。【原文：Hungary plans to block the European Union’s 20th sanctions package on Russia while oil transit on the Druzhba pipeline remains stalled, Foreign Minister Peter Szijjarto said on Sunday.】

item.title: 波兰Azoty公司寻求在聚合物业务重组中减记83%债务
item.description: 格鲁帕阿佐蒂公司正寻求偿还约17%的债务，这些债务用于建造中东欧地区最大的丙烯和聚丙烯生产基地。【原文：Grupa Azoty SA seeks to settle just about 17% of debt taken to build the biggest propylene and polypropylene complex in central and eastern Europe.】

item.title: 马来西亚伊斯兰党在反对党联盟重组中崛起
item.description: 马来西亚伊斯兰党在历经数月内部分裂后，正逐步掌控反对党联盟。此举可能增强该党影响力，并在2028年前举行的全国大选前重塑政治格局。【原文：Malaysia’s Islamist party is taking control of the opposition coalition following months of internal rift, a move that could increase its influence and disrupt the political landscape ahead of a general election due by 2028.】

item.title: 德国反对欧盟债务立场未变，克林贝尔向《法兰克福汇报》表示
item.description: 德国财政部长拉尔斯·克林贝尔表示，德国认为没有必要改变其对欧洲共同债务的立场，支持总理弗里德里希·梅尔茨反对近期呼吁增加联合借贷的呼声。【原文：German Finance Minister Lars Klingbeil said Germany sees no need to revise its stance on common European debt, backing Chancellor Friedrich Merz in opposing recent calls for more joint borrowing.】

item.title: 马克龙要求特朗普解除对欧洲官员的制裁
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙致函唐纳德·特朗普，要求这位美国同行解除对包括前欧盟委员蒂埃里·布雷顿在内的官员实施的制裁。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron wrote to Donald Trump asking his US counterpart to lift sanctions imposed on officials including former European Union Commissioner Thierry Breton.】
